oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-12-26 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from December 26, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performers Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1055th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl; Marty Robbins; Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Marty Robbins introduces Chet Atkins -- I Know That You Know (Chet Atkins) -- Grant Turner introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Marty Robbins) (recording) -- Marty Robbins introduces Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper -- Rachel's Guitar (Wilma Lee & Stoney Cooper) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- Waiting For The Robert E. Lee (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Marty Robbins talk -- Auld Lang Syne (Marty Robbins, cast) -- Closing statement (Marty Robbins) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Network announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
